about_the_game:
No clipping...


Explore the wonders of these famous liminal spaces as you try and make your way through the different levels, as well as surviving the hostile entities and environments that await you. You'll have to run, hide, fight back, and above all : keep track of your surroundings, it would be a shame if you found yourself separated from your group...

Never alone


Survive alone or with a group of friends. The game offers a selection of characters with their own perks and flaws. Choose wisely, the Backrooms always punish those who make bad choices...

Backrooms wiki coming to life


What makes this game different from the others ? Not that much, except for the inclusion of a variety of concept originating from the wiki (both fandom and wikidot). To ensure the best quality, only the best articles are taken into consideration (ranging from levels to sub-layers to entities to objects to groups of interest). The idea of this game is to satisfy wiki fans as well as keeping a feeling of constant dread.
Additionally, the game offers some lore to those who seek notes...

name: Against The Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: No clipped through your ground, huh ? What a shame... Well get used to it ! You'll live in the Backrooms now. To summarize : run for your life, hide from the entities, and keep track of your surroundings, you don't want to get separated from your group...
